casebody.data:
No. 10-8168 (10A664). Jeffrey Matthews, Petitioner v. Justin Jones, Director, Oklahoma Department of Corrections, et al. 562 U.S. 1171, 131 S. Ct. 974, 2011 U.S. LEXIS 607.

178 L. Ed. 2d 807,

January 10, 2011.

Application for stay of execution of sentence of death, presented to Justice Sotomayor, and by her referred to the Court, denied. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Tenth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 627 F.3d 1336.
